title: They lowered Nami's price
body:
so they finally decide to do it after she has been out for so long? finally.

Edit: oh wait, more then Nami actually, whoops. :P

replies.body: Champion prices are reduced in order of release each time a new champion is released.
It was her turn. She dropped to 4800 when Kai'Sa came out. Zed dropped to 4800 when Zoe came out and Vi will drop when the next champion comes out followed by Thresh, Quinn, and Zac.
